snippet.title: Fresh Tracks - Official Behind-The-Scenes Video | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into Fresh Tracks and hear from the development team about this rhythm action game's creation. Taking place in a mythical Nordic setting, Fresh Tracks invites players to strap on their skis for a non-stop music-driven adventure. As the protagonist, Skaii, players begin their journey gliding through a beautiful snow-covered forest to the beat of an ethereal pop soundtrack, an Aurora shimmering overhead. Soon, however, the path diverges, and players must fight, jump, and dodge increasing obstacles and menacing minions as they delve deeper into the darkness that has befallen the land of Norwyn. Fresh Tracks will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Steam, and Xbox Series X/S.
